```{r}
library(qs)
```

## Loading Data

```{r}
data <- qread("tmdb_top50_budget_movies.qs")
cast <- qread("cast_correceted.qs")
movie_df <- qread("movie_df.qs")
```

### Reviewing available data

```{r}
cast_df <- cast$cast_corrected
head(cast_df)
```

```{r}
head(movie_df)
```

```{r}
cast_complete <- cast_df |> 
  left_join(movie_df,by = "movie_id")
head(cast_complete)
```
